H0.text: Complete the name of the Church of England diocese: 'Bath and .....'. Bath and Salisbury

H1.text: Complete the name of the Church of England diocese: 'Bath and .....'. Bath and Bristol

H2.text: Complete the name of the Church of England diocese: 'Bath and .....'. Bath and Gloucester

H3.text: Complete the name of the Church of England diocese: 'Bath and .....'. WELLS

A4.text: The Diocese of Bath and Wells is a diocese in the Church of England Province of Canterbury in England.

A5.text: the Pope declared, on 3 January 1245, that whilst Roger should remain, he would be bishop of a see thenceforth styled the Diocese of Bath and Wells.
